name: Harry Potter: Life in Puzzles. (Jicsaw puzzles)
name_original: Harry Potter: Life in Puzzles. (Jicsaw puzzles)
description:
Puzzles, Harry Potter will plunge you again, into the world of magic and wizardry.Puzzles is an old and exciting game that has not lost its popularity for a long time. The meaning of the game is very simple: the player needs to assemble a picture from small pieces. Their shape and quantity can be very different. There are very easy puzzles that can be assembled in a couple of minutes, but some need more time.

In the game Harry Potter: Life in Puzzles, you will no doubt like:

- Fragments, scenes from the 7 seasons of Harry Potter!

- Ability to collect puzzles without the Internet!

- A variety of puzzles to choose from - over 1000 high-resolution puzzles!

- The ability to participate in the in-game ranking of players!

- 7 difficulty levels, the difficulty in each season is different, up to 220 pieces - Start from the basics and become the Great Wizard!

- Collect several puzzles at the same time and track your progress!

- Open cards of magicians in the Hall of rewards.

- Puzzles with the mode of rotation of the pieces - a game of logic for real potteromania!

- Extremely simple interface and at the same time magical.

- Use spells in Harry Potter mode!

This is actually a game that a Harry Potter fan cannot miss !!!

Add some magic to your life!
